content: यापन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Causing to go or go away. {@--2@} Curing. {@--3@} Mitigating. {@--4@} Supporting (life). --नं, --ना {@--1@} Causing to go away, driving out, expulsion, removal. {@--2@} Cure or alleviation (of a disease). {@--3@} Spending or passing time, as in कालयापनं {@--4@} Delay, procrastination. {@--5@} Support, maintenance. {@--6@} Practice, exercise. {@--7@} Loitering.
